newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: SAfrica beats arrears tax collection target - paper.
newsitem.headline: SAfrica beats arrears tax collection target - paper.

text.p: South Africa had already reached its target of collecting 1.5 billion rand in arrears taxes this tax year by November 1996, Business Report newspaper said on Friday, quoting a top official.
Commissioner for state finances Trevor van Heerden said the final figure for the fiscal year to March 30 could be substantially higher, although he declined to speculate on the final amount.
Van Heerden said that in the first eight months of the tax year 73 percent more tax returns had been assessed than in the same period of the previous year.
